messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Comms down.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I looked into the Supermatter without measons, so don't wonder if i act weird.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You're free to break into the kitchen since we got no cook.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Try not to leave your department uinless you want to suffacate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Our only Miner went SSD in mining office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Taqi Al-Rafiq is dead somewhere, but he doesn't have suit sensors on so we'll probalby never find him, don't be liike Taqi Al-Rafiq

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], not more than 15 energy draining parasites have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: The Anti matter engine is now up and running, i am weldingoff certain doors to keep it out of public reach

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: EVA Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our bluespace sensors indicate that there is a space pirate trying to steal your plasma, please make sure he is apprehended.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a swarm of rodents have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The space pirate is stealing the plasma at Locker Room. Be careful with the canister

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Congratulations on eliminating the pirate that could be easily apprehended, your prize is fixing the giant plasma hole in science.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Listen here, just because you are invisible doesn't mean you are allowed to attack random people.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Comms is experiencing problems with charging, i will occasionally go in to induce hte APC if things go quiet

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Janitor has been sent to gulag.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The ED-209 was emagged so i had to destroy it, what the hell is going on?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Shuttle Y/N?

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Paint unit 308 attacked me, breaking law 2 reeeeeeee

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Being member of a cult is illegal and will be punished with extreme consequences.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Shuttle Y/N?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I also seem to be the last Head, don't ask what happened to the 3 other ones.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Chaplain is a cultulist, kill them at all cost.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: FREE FOR ALL, ITS LEGAL TO MURDER KILL EVERYONE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Kristina Houston. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
